JobFullDesc: At Raytheon Missiles & Defense, you have the opportunity to try new things and make a bigger difference across a broader end-to-end solution, a richer technology and product set, an expanded range of disciplines, a growing global footprint and a more diverse team of colleagues and customers. Our Mechanical Products Team leads the mechanical design, development and integration of tactical systems. The department is comprised of individuals with technical expertise in hardware design, integration and production support. The Mechanical Products Team uses state-of-the-art tools, processes technology and Six Sigma principles. The Tactical Radar Products Department is seeking a professional candidate for a Mechanical Engineer II position to work within the Electronic Subsystems section. The Electronic Subsystems group performs preliminary design, detailed design, release to production, fabrication, and assembly & integration across multiple product lines. Performing the detail design, and working with the design leads for the completion of the Technical Data Packages (TDP) for mechanical subsystems.  Performing design services across all program phases focused mainly on mechanical design, production engineering support, electronic cabinet design for naval platforms and TDP Development/ Maintenance.  Collaborating with other engineering disciplines, and Global Supply Chain to resolve design or supplier related issues.Responsibilities to Anticipate: Use preliminary sketches, diagrams, and other engineering information to generate 3-D design models and/or conceptual designsSupporting detailed designs, working with design leads, or implementing COTS installation activities.
